PAGE.TITLE: Cucumber
PAGE.CONTENT:
Specify where is the Gecko WebDriver on the Maven command line mvn -Dwebdriver.gecko.driver=c:/Users/lmazure/bin/geckodriver.exe test
Define the reports to be generated
in the code @Suite
@IncludeEngines("cucumber")
@SelectClasspathResource("prestashoptest")
@ConfigurationParameter(key = PLUGIN_PROPERTY_NAME,
value="pretty:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber.txt," +
"junit:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber.xml," +
"json:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber.json," +
"html:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber.html," +
"io.qameta.allure.cucumber7jvm.AllureCucumber7Jvm," +
"timeline:target/cucumber-reports/CucumberTimeline")
public class RunCucumberTest {
}
from the command line mvn test -Dcucumber.plugin="junit:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber_junit.xml,html:target/cucumber-reports/Cucumber_html.html,timeline:target/cucumber-reports/CucumberTimeline"
In order to be able to generate Allure report, add the following dependency in pom.xml <dependency>
<groupId>io.qameta.allure</groupId>
<artifactId>allure-cucumber7-jvm</artifactId>
<version>2.17.2</version>
</dependency>
